Class TreeMapView.NodeRenderer

prefuse.render.Renderer
Enclosing class:
TreeMapView
public static class TreeMapView.NodeRenderer
extends prefuse.render.AbstractShapeRenderer

A renderer for treemap nodes. Draws simple rectangles, but defers the bounds management to the layout.
